basics.name: Ravid Febrian Ramadhan
basics.summary:
As an accomplished automation engineer, I combine a solid foundation in electrical engineering from FH Aachen with extensive hands-on experience in PLC programming using Codesys, Step7, and TIA Portal.
My expertise extends to visualizing complex automation systems with WinCC and NICOS 2.0, enabling me to design, develop, and optimize cutting-edge industrial control solutions with precision and efficiency. In addition, I have deepened my technical skill set as a research assistant in IT infrastructure, network engineering, and IoT projects. My strong organizational and communication abilities were further honed as chairperson of the KIA-Indonesian Community Aachen, where I led collaborative initiatives and managed diverse projects. I am confident that my unique blend of technical proficiency and leadership skills will make me a valuable asset to your team.
